summary: Dagwood wants to join the trout club and Blondie wants a fur coat. Jealousy reigns when Dag's old girlfriend Joan shows up, but nothing else matters when a drawing at the movie theatre provides money for the coat.
cast: Penny Singleton|Arthur Lake|Larry Simms|Daisy|Rita Hayworth|Danny Mummert|Don Beddoe|John Qualen|Fay Helm|Irving Bacon|Thurston Hall|William Brisbane|Willie Best|Chester Clute|Mary Currier|Dick Curtis|Hal K. Dawson|Jack Egan|George Guhl|Claire James|Gene Morgan|Rita Owin|Emory Parnell|Ralph Peters|Janet Shaw
title: Blondie on a Budget
